code:
import axios from"axios";const apiClient=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||"http://localhost:5000/api",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}});// Interceptor para agregar el token en las solicitudes
apiClient.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");if(token){config.headers.Authorization=`Bearer ${token}`;}return config;});export default apiClient;
